titles.title: To suspend the duty on modified secondary and modified secondary-tertiary amine phenol/formaldehyde copolymers until January 1, 2001.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/23/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2000, the duty on anion exchange resins based on copolymers of phenol-formaldehyde in primary form.
